post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Software Developer



  Cogsdale Corporation?BR>Provides the most flexible, the most integrated and the most dependable financial management and billing software for utilities and municipalities.

Software Developers
Our growth and new opportunities is driving the need for additional software developers on our team. Your focus will be on creating additional modules and features for our suite of applications for utilities and municipalities using Microsoft technology.

The ideal candidate will combine a Bachelor of Computer Science or equivalent with development experience using Microsoft SQL Server and Visual Basic. Thorough understanding of .NET technology will be an advantage. Personally, you take initiative and focus on delivering results. The successful candidates will work from our Mississauga office.

Contact Information
info@cogsdale.com
Cogsdale Corporation
241 Brackley Point Road
Charlottetown PE C1A 6Z2
Fax: 902-368-5960
post.title: Software Developer
